column1: How compatible with me are YOU?
event,"this morning i was at chuck e. cheese.
and i kept finding quarters all over the ground, under machines.
and there was a machine where you could press a button and quarters would come out.
and even though it was stealing and i felt bad for it i kept doing it because i wanted them so bad.
so i played that thing where you get stuffed animals out of the machine with the claw that never works.
and i got a mickey mouse doll that was blue and not like mickey mouse at all.
and then i played this other game and won cotton candy.
i asked the lady if i could have a different flavor.
she didn't let me. she wasn't very good at her job.
and i thought it was gonna be gross, but it was really good.
and i thought about the day, and i thought about the dream and then i had the best feeling i've had in the last 24 hours.
event,"i would post if only anyone actually read it."
event,"so no one did that test thing.
i guess i'm just a dork.
If I were alone in a room with Lydia I would _____.
_____ is how I describe meeting Lydia.
If i could tell you two things about Lydia I'd say she _____________ and i'd like her to know that ____________.
fill this out and you're totally my er best friend."
event,"well alot of people commented. thanks guys.
devin, when will we ever hang out again? heh.
sean, awww sean i was reading your diary and all i want in life is for you to live in mansfield and we could hang out until you got sick of me. heh.
mike, i miss you! go to the infirmity/a flesh so weak show tonight.
and to the others thanks for liking my hair and giving me a friend :) heh.
umm so anyway, i don't really know what to write about..so uhhh i'll get to that later.
event,"well i don't really write in here anymore.
do you guys want me to.
i love you. i love you!"
event,"If you were [ _______], what would you be?
a flower? something that withers and opens back up when warm weather comes around again.
an animal? a white horse or an owl.
a vegetable? an artichoke. definitely an artichoke.
are you left handed or right handed? right handed.
are you smart? no. not nerd-smart. but, socially smart. or socially aware.
how many personalities do you have? one? what?
how many piercings do you have/where? i don't.
do you like v-8? meh. it's ok with lime and hot sauce in it.
what was your first word? daddy, i think.
do you read your horoscope? no.
can you do a cartwheel? i used to could. maybe now, i think i'll try that later.
do you have contact lenses? no.
can you drive? yes. but i'm sure if i tried to drive a long distance at this point i would kill someone.
what do you drive? a chevy blazer.
do you drool in your sleep? yes. always.
do you lick your envelopes or use a sponge? lick.
do you keep a journal? yes. www.xanga.com/foryourlove
what languages do you know? english.
do you like onions? only in hamburgers, and cooked.
do you like cotton candy? not really.
what instruments can you play? well kinda learning keyboards, and I can sing.
what words do you overuse? insecure.
what do you sleep in? whatever i'm wearing. or i change into something.
what's your bedtime? whenever i feel like sleeping.
how many pillows do sleep on/with? one, on a full sized bed. i'm so excited that i have a full sized bed, because when/if i get married i won't have to get a new bed! it's perfect-sized.
do you like to dance? swing dancing, always.
do you like to sing? always!
are you any good at it? possibly.
do you like to talk on the phone? rarely. well i don't mind talking to j-lowe on the phone because i'm used to it. i guess i'm warming up to phone-talk altogether.
how many times have you moved? like three-four?
what do you think of chain letters? please refrain from sending them to me.
do you like where you live? oh so very much.
is your bedroom messy? no, i cleaned it today.
do you like your handwriting? not particularly.
do you like to finger-paint? hehe. sure.
what do you smell like? warm vanilla sugar.
what do you put on hotdogs and hamburgers? hot dogs = relish, mustard, catsup, cheese, chili (if we have it). hamburger= mustard+catsup.
do you sleep with socks on? sometimes, but they always come off.
are you shy? no. not really.
do you talk to yourself? sometimes. if i feel really really akward.
is your house 1, 2, or 3 stories? two.
do you have a basement or an attic? uh. not sure.
what flavor fluoride do you get at the dentist? haha speaking of, i'll have to do that tomorrow. one time it was bubble gum, and one time it was strawberry, and i hate it.
did you go to preschool? no.
are you a morning person? no.
do you have a friend that you wish wasn't? haha. what?
who has the attractive voice in the world? uh. yes no comment.
who has the most annoying voice in the world? i don't know. no one's voice is annoying.
Do you believe in reincarnation? no sir.
do you believe in ghosts? no.
do you believe in bigfoot? no.
do you believe in the loch ness monster? no.
what's your favorite feature (on yourself)? probably my torso area and my hands. oh no wait my eyes.
what do you do when you're nervous? blush. alot.
who's your role model? hmm. hard to say.
what celebrities do you look like? hopefully no one.
what will/did you name your daughters? trinity elizabeth possibly. i'll have to talk it over with my man.
have you ever gone skinny dipping? no.
have you ever thought you were gonna die? yes. but it was of course ridiculous of me.
where's the farthest place you ever traveled? california? haha.
Would you rather burn to death or freeze to death? probably freeze.
If you could change your name, what would it be? funny you ask, i was just thinking today that i'm glad my name is Lydia."
event,"i never thought the age sixteen would suck so much.
it's just that i've grown to be so insecure, that i can't really be myself anymore. and that kills me.
i'll grow out of it i'm sure.

i cried for awhile tonight because someone said something mean to me in jest, but still it's something i'm very insecure about. so it really got to me. it was like taking the two knives that bother me the most, and stabbing them straight into the chest. ha. oh well.
i hate this. i hate it so much.
and i'm so left wondering. and that kinda sucks too."
event,"hold me closer tony danza. haha. ewww tony danza.
ohhhh minority report is such a good movie. yum.
but they remind me of the cali days.
event,"yes i dyed my hair and trimmed it. tell me what ya think...
ok just go here. the pictures aren't loading. so you can see them here...

_do the same with a lyric from a song_""for the benefit of tom and mary, before our guests arrive, if they haven't found out already, it's gonna blow their minds"" <s>Tom & Mary- Ben Folds Five</s>
_have you ever tried to analyze your own dreams_no
_what posters do you have in your room_""none but i am soon painting them."" hm. yes me too. in fact i took the last of the posters down lastnight, because i am painting it today.
_what's your favorite color of post it note_? i don't really care.
_how many cassette tapes do you own_ not many.
_how many cds do you own_hm alot.
_ever bought a cd for just one song_more than likely
_have you ever lied to get off the phone_ lied? hm. not sure.

_or maybe a poem_ maybe? i'm not too big a fan of poetry.
_ever been in an airplane_ yes. and i puked. each time. well almost each time.
_if so where were you flying to_ cali. each and every time.
_what color are your shoes_ black cons. navy blue velcros from wally world.
_describe your bedroom_ completely empty, save the furniture.
_would you ever shave someone else's head_ yes.
_name your favorite type of music_ mellow.
_what movie do you have almost all the lines memorized to_ almost famous? hehe yes.
_current mood_ meh. yes, my chest itches. man me and marina.
_current dress_ jeans. brown sweater. black tank top. cons.
_current longing_ pizza, that i will make soon.
_current game_ the ren&stempy show on sega. yes. me and sarah WILL figure out how to get past the first level. hehe.
_current windows open_ none. i love when the windows are open though. i will open my window when we start painting.
_current desktop picture_ a picture of me. joy will hate me for it, and make me change it.
_current favorite musical artist_ pedro the lion/dashboard. yes, i'm bringing back dashboard. heh.
_current favorite group_ wait. i screwed that up. um. norah jones. everything is backwards!
_current cds in stereo_ dashboard in my room.

_current crush_ um. hehehehehehehehehehe. giddy? yes, and he doesn't know because i took a quiz in cosmogirl lastnigt, and it said i'm perfect with how i handle it, and that means that everything is perfect. siiiiike.
_current favorite celebrity_  hehehehehehehehehe. elijah ""i have the best name ever"" wood
_last book you read_ ugh. i already said. hehehe sarah just rolled her eyes at the background.
_last movie you saw_ uhhhhm. lord of the rings. ttt.
_last song you heard_ umm no comment. but the one that im listening to now is furtherseemsforever pictures of shore.
_last thing you had to drink_ uhhhh. chocolate milk.
_have a dream that keeps coming back_no
_play an instrument_my voice. and learning to play piano.
_believe there is life on other planets_no
_remember your first love_i don't think i have one.
_have any gay or lesbian friends_ i don't think so?
_believe it's possible to remain faithful forever_yes
_go to or plan to go to college_no
_have an obsession_ i don't think so
_have a secret crush_ um. well kinda.
_care about looks_ looks to me is not the outside, but what comes out of the person makes them look a certain way. if ugliness comes out of them. they are ugly. vice versa."
event,"so what are some of the things you've learned this year?

well i've really learned to calm the heck down, and stop worrying about everything so much. to trust God more. to love more. that it's not about works, it's about Jesus. those are just a few. I also learned that being humble is where God wants me. i didn't just hear it this time, i finallyfinallyfinally learned it. i learned to keep my mouth shut more when i want to say something that would not be good. the list goes on. i'm continually learning because that's how screwed up i am. heh.
most listened to cds of the year?
probably norah jones-come away with me
i listened to other cd's alot, but i listened to those two cds more than anyone should ever listen to one cd.
favorite pieces of clothing that you wore alot?
the jeans that i bought from wal-mart. they were on sale for five dollars. so i bought four pairs of the samexact pair.
umm...hmmm.....probably when sarah got her fingers smashed in the garage door/when the lightning hit the house. those were some scary times.
going to dbc with jennifer all the time in the summer after she spent the night on saturdays and we watched movies on the foldout couch.
getting to know all the infirmians better.
hehe emailing with matt lucas back in the day.
nights spent at jessie and mike's house.
breaking away from the steve thing. what a relief. <3 to him still though. man we liked eachother so much. it wasn't the right thing though. it's good we never went out.
my sixteenth party night and taking sarah murray home the next day.
learning things. oh how i love learning. seriously. spiritual things.
when spazaustin spent the night at our heezee and me and him stayed up talking. wait was that this year?
the pedro show with the josh's (whom i love like whoa) and shelly (whom i also love like whoa).
times with becca+mark+just everyone else i've hung out with.
so many more. must stop now.
things i'm looking forward to this year:
****if God wills it all of course****
turning seventeen, although all i want in life is to stay sixteen.
hopefully getting a significant other. hehe.
getting to know some church people better.
getting married. just kidding. but ya never know. har har."
event,"[ x ] Spell your first name backwards - aidyl.

[ x ] The story behind your lj user name - um. i thought it was cool. and something about doing anything for God's love. then i found out it was the name of some terrible sitcom on the wb a few years ago. but eh. whatev.
[ x ] Are you a lesbian - no
[ x ] Where do you live - texas
[ x ] 4 words that sum you up - fun. alot of work.

[ x ] Toothbrush - it's the best toothbrush ever. it has soft bristles. when i am done with it i should make a bracelet out of it because i do not want to forget it. i should give it a name. hmm. wanda. sounds good. spelled just like that.
[ x ] Jewelry worn daily - CG pink bracelet. represent. a bracelet that i think my mom gave me like a year and a half ago? and recently a green choker string. it looks good on ya, i mean me.
[ x ] Pillow cover - some flowery one. barton used it one time so for like a night it smelled like cologne. it was a good smell.
[ x ] Blanket - a cream colored very soft and warm one. annnnd a comforter. a great comforter.
[ x ] Coffee cup - i don't have a specific one.
[ x ] Sunglasses - a pink pair that are vintage-ee. but i want j-lo ones.
[ x ] Underwear - what? which ones? peeeeeeeeeeeeeerveert. hehe.
[ x ] Favorite top - hmm. my button downs. that is my new style. steal it and die.
[ x ] CD in stereo right now - i don't know. i'm listening to norah jones though.
[ x ] What you are wearing now - jeans. blue striped t. grey hoodie.
[ x ] In my mouth - lemonheads were.
[ x ] In my head - i don't know.
[ x ] Wishing - that joy would get my hair stuff. which i believe she is.
[ x ] After this - probably clean the stuff off my shelves so me and my padre can paint.
[ x ] Talking to - online? no one.
[ x ] Eating - nothing. my tummy has been hurting from eating lemonheads.
[ x ] If you could get away with it and murder anyone, and for what reason - no one.
[ x ] Person you wish you could see right now - hehehehehehe. no comment. annnnnd laura.
[ x ] Is next to you - too much. deoderant. dental floss. nail clippers. letter from adam's mom. cds. pads. dirty dishes. salt. tums. container labeled 'jennifers'.
[ x ] Some of your favorite movies - lotr. les miserables. almost famous. amelie.
[ x ] Something you're looking forward to in the upcoming month - hehehehe. well that annnnnd getting my permit (finally, yes!) and i don't know what else.
[ x ] The last thing you ate - tums.
[ x ] Something that you are deathly afraid of - deathly afraid of nothing. i don't like snakes though.
[ x ] Do you like candles - yes.
[ x ] Do you like incense - yes. some of it.
[ x ] Do you believe in love - Jesus is love. Jesus is in me.
[ x ] Do you believe in soul mates - yes
[ x ] Do you believe in love at first sight - i don't know.
[ x ] Do you believe in Heaven - yes
[ x ] Do you believe in forgiveness - yes
[ x ] Do you believe in God - very much so.

[ x ] What do you want done with your body when you die - hmm. i'd like it to be buried,  and i want tears of joy from all my brothers/sisters in Christ that think upon the day when we'll meet again at the best place we could ever be. i'm so glad i have that to look forward to.
[ x ] If you could have any animal for a pet, what would it be - an ape. hehehe.
[ x ] What is the latest you've ever stayed up - who knows.
[ x ] Ever been to Belgium - no
[ x ] Can you eat with chopsticks - probably
[ x ] What's your favorite coin - quarter
[ x ] What are some of your favorite candy - I love candy
[ x ] What's something that you wish people would understand - the truth.
[ x ] What's something you wish you could understand better - how to love people.
[ x ] Anyone you miss that you haven't seen in a long time - hmm. yes. probably.
[ x ] What's one thing you want to make happen for tomorrow - meh."
event,"yay i saw carley tonight and she talked to me about my lj and she wants to add me now.
and i hung out tyler and i love tyler yes.
and i hope me and marina are still on for our ""date"".
and dan is shocked that i will not kiss till im married. no wait he's beyond shocked, he can't stop talking to me about it. hahahaha."
event,"wow. i accidently messed that quiz up.
i took all the perverted questions out and filled it out on wordpad and then accidently put the unfilled-fullofgrossquestions one in my diary.
when i see someone that seems upset, or needs something to put a skip in their step, or i just feel like doing it...i will try to brighten their day. someway.
and if they're unappreciative, then that's ok, i still tried and it's not about me anyway, so yeah. yay.
this morning i awoke at 7:40 after going to sleep at like 1:45 lastnight.
threw on some clothes, and some hair spray. and did a couple things.
annnd i sang. we played. and lots of people commented on my voice. and people really liked us. and this guy that plays in malls asked us if we wanted to go around with him and play at malls. hehe.
i had to fight my flesh alot while i was up there. so i did it for Jesus. because if it weren't for Him, i wouldn't have even been up there. it's totally for Jesus.

theeeeeeen the pastor's daughter (breanna, 11) wanted us to come to her house and play with her, so we did. and her little brother (joe joe, 8). oh they're SOOOO cute. i love them. we made a tent with sheets in their living room and went in it and made a ""club"" of which you can't be in the tent unless you had the official ""club card"" hehehehe.
and i ate sushi (joy had some) with salmon in it. it made me wanna puke. ewww i hate fish. i'm an idiot for trying it. yuck.

and breanna pretended like we were at a resteraunt and she was the waitress/cook and made up a menu of the food they had and asked what we wanted. it was cute. and she put classical music on in the background and made me chili (from a can) and made sarah breaded chicken (leftovers). and told me to pretend like the chili was italian food and asked me how the italian food was. hehehehe. cute.

anyway, we left there and as we went outside we saw paul and chad (drane) nextdoor. man it was weird. i looked over at them and noticed their shoes from far away and thought ""oh they have the reeboks"" and then we almost left without noticing, but paul saw us and all of us were like squinting to make sure that we had the right people and he's like ""is it the sisters??"" hahahaha. so we talked for a minute then left to go to wal-mart to pick something up and see daniel.  well joy locked her keys in the car so daniel got them out without a problem (because he's that cool) and then we came home. i napped. did the dishes, and i have to go clean up the puppy's room in a minute.
seeing chad and paul made me wanna call up becky and cindy.
anyway, that was my day in a nutshell.
who else made tents when they were little? i know i did. it was the best thing, ever.
my friends trailor partly burned down today. everything in the room burned up except for the unharmed bible. wow right? God's so good. I'm so encouraged/refreshed.
today i love that family more than ever! the mother and me get along like whooooa, and the dad is cool and the girl is cool and the boys are so cool.
event,"man i'm so bothered and confused...
someday i'll get sick of it. or am i already?
i put it all behind me, give it to Him, or i'll just worry all day like whoa."
event,"i had an awfully weird dream this morning.
i was at this big concert for the scene here, but there were all kinds of different rooms, and it was more like an auditorium.

i had the puppy in her box with me. mikey exinfirmity was there. he put his arm around me like a side hug to hug me and i did the same to him and we stayed that way until we got to this room where all our infirmity friends were, and the evelynn kids too, and other people. it was a play. like one where people just saw their lines and said them. they didn't hear them before. they just did it. sarah keane was there and she did a line and i looked down at her and me and her were like ""what???"" because it didn't really make sense, and she did it wrong. and then they said I had a line, and i was like where are the lines???? and they said it was on a monitor in a room that i could see, and i couldn't find them, so i got up and went into a little room where they were supposed to be, and i kept looking and everyone was waiting for me to say my line.
event,"xlydiaxruthx: i realized the other day that me+josh+josh's jacket makes me look fat
xlydiaxruthx: but then again, doesnt every jacket
chris: coats make me look fat too. i try to get them as tight as possible mostof the time
xlydiaxruthx: sucks for me, because i can't go buy a jacket
xlydiaxruthx: i just have to do with whatever i have
xlydiaxruthx: and josh lost the only one that looks good on me
xlydiaxruthx: haha yeah, but what are ya gonna do
xlydiaxruthx: when what? when did he lose it?

xlydiaxruthx: well last year he begged me to borrow my jacket, and he'd trade with me, so i did and he gave me some flimsy jacket, and i gave it back, and then he gave me a dickies jacket and it made me look fat times a million, so i gave it back, and he gave me another jacket (keep in mind that he wouldn't ever bring my jacket back to me) and the jacket he gave me was sooooo flimsy.
xlydiaxruthx: so i had that all summer, and he had mine, and then he moved four times, so my jacket is in a box somewhere
xlydiaxruthx: and so he gave me the one i have now
chris: you shoul bust him up
xlydiaxruthx: and how josh lowe got the jacket that he gave me is..
xlydiaxruthx: josh cancer and him traded jackets and josh cancer lost josh lowe's jacket, so josh lowe kept cancer's jacket and gave it to me
xlydiaxruthx: and one night at a show i went to hug josh cancer and he goes ""YOU'RE WEARING MY JACKET"" and that's how i found all this out
xlydiaxruthx: and i want it to smell all fresh and clean and girly before i give it back to them

peter_letsch: yeah i still gotta eat dinner tonight

peter_letsch: i did almost the same thing once
peter_letsch: except it fell in the trash can
xlydiaxruthx: so you just left it there
peter_letsch: i wasn't about to start digging for any treasures or anything

xlydiaxruthx: so i threw it out
xlydiaxruthx: and that was my story
xlydiaxruthx: tonight when my sister came home with a special aqua colored toothbrush for me
xlydiaxruthx: and it was so different than my other tooth brush

xlydiaxruthx: see my other tooth brush was a tooth brush that i found somewhere in our house. because i had lost my other toothbrush or something. it was one of those disposable toothbrushes that you use at the dentists. well i found it and used it for months. it was the most stiff toothbrush ever.
xlydiaxruthx: so tonight my sister brought home a soft bristled REAL toothbrush and it was like a hug to my gums
peter_letsch: i don't know of anyone else that can have a conversation about toothbrushes and make it fun and interesting

event,"ok. well here are some interesting (and true) stories. they're all true. i promise.

ok, so yesterday me and my momma went out together. we went to the thrift shop. well on the way home we're just going along our merry way and the road came to a dead end. we couldn't figure out why (it's the way we usually go home). so do we turn around and go another way? no, i just jump out of the car, remove the orange cones that are blocking our way and after she goes through put them back in place and then run in the car and we are on our way. haha. i thought that was great.
so today's stories are much more interesting..

i'm in wal-mart with my dad and my sister. i figured that today i wouldn't do anything with my hair, because i'm just going to wal-mart and a pawn shop. well we're in the mens section of wal-mart looking for some pants for sarah, and this guy comes up to the rack we're at. i could tell he was wantin' to get fresh with me, and so i was kinda weirded out. well like right away he starts talking to us. so he asks us how far away grapevine is, and my dad was talking to him about so the guy starts to say how he's trying to get used to texas. he just moved here, and his band is playing a show soon. he says he's in slipknot. his name is ""corey"". he's the lead singer. he talks foreeeeeeeeeeever and tells us all kinds of stories about when they played places, and why he doesn't have long hair anymore, and what his mask is made of that he plays with, and his new house is the big a** house across from cha cha's. and he just keeps telling us so much stuff. so i was veryyy skeptical of him the whole time. he said he's about to play a show with Korn and some other bands (i can't remember who) and he said he could probably give echocast the hookups to get big, and he said that he could get us backstage passes and tickets to the show they're about to play with Korn, and we could ""party with them and see how they're all really like"". and then he gave us his number 817-975-63**. it was weird. he asked us our ages and blah blah blah and he said he's not a teenager (which i could easily gather, he looks in his late twenties or mid twenties). so yeah, dad and sarah are lookin' at some pants and he goes ""is that your dad"" and i said yeah, and he said ""you know you're really cute...you're gorgeous, i gotta give you a hug."" so he gives me a side hug, WHICH i don't understand, because if he's such a creep then if i were him i'd give me a REAL hug, because if he's creepy he's gonna want boob action, and what's so great about a side hug? so he must be a PSYCHO. BECAUSE, like about three months ago he went into joy's work and he told us all the same stuff he told her. and he hit on joy too, and he told us today that he thought joy was flirting with him, so he was surprised that she had a boyfriend. so yeah, we finnnnnally stopped talking to him. so we get home and sarah calls joy at work to tell her about it (because he remembered joy) and joy said that he went into her work today, but not when she was there (her boss told her that he did). so that kind of creeps me out. i mean, he went into her work and then just HAPPENS to walk up to us in wal-mart the same day (probably the same hour). and he had no idea who we were. if he's a stalker, i wonder how he knew what me, sarah and dad looked like. so i've come to two conclusions..
(a)he IS a crazy stalker and he's trying to get in good with the family. or
(b) hotness runs in our family. hahaha.
so yes, it was very freakin' strange. pray for joy and mine and sarah's safety.

me dad and sarah go get in the car and we get to a stoplight and we're just sitting there waiting for the light to turn red, and dad said ""that car just got in a wreck!"" and he points behind us, and i looked back and this really nice red car had rolled over once and landed on it's side and i saw it going back and forth, and i saw the smoke. and i got scared and then i saw a guy go help him and call the police and stuff, but the weird thing was that the car almost hit us, but it didn't. God's really watching over us. that makes me so happy. then on our way home we saw the ambulance and fire truck that was going to the accident.
uhm, well yeah and i carried a huuuge tv upstairs all by myself. i'm such a haus. hahahah.

hahahahaha. i just called joy and i was talking to her about it and telling her to be careful, and she said that he came into her work and since she wasn't there he started hitting on her coworker, danielle. hahaha. he just wants to have sex."
